Articles.Content: KAMG is requesting a medium range manueverable fighter for Jeb to blow up.Requirements are 1 Kerbal 2 missles and manueverable. Can be about 7m across and 8m long...

Atmospheric (jet) or space-based? I might have a contender for an atmospheric one...

(shown here following an all-stock air-to-air missile kill! )

It does also have VTOL, by the way. You interested? (More info on my company page)

I have these two, one is a large bomber one is a smaller fighter.

Probably better off putting modded missiles on them though they come with stock missiles, small fighter should hold 12 missiles the bomber should hold 30 missiles before ruining the balance of the craft.

Both are very maneuverable (will do 12+g turns) and will do over 1000m/s while fully loaded and 1500+m/s with no payload.

They were not made with FAR or NEAR though.

Mini beast mk4: http://www./download/23xcn84s9c75112/Mini+Beast+mk4+%28Armed%29.craft

The beast mk6: http://www./download/nprp9cqsb17jrbu/The+Beast+mk+6+%28Armed%29.craft

If you want the better versions of these craft without the missiles they are on the stock craft repository OP.

Edited October 1, 2014 by Roflcopterkklol

Here, have my cutting-edge VTOL fighter jet: The THROMGORD mk2!

It VTOLs beautifully (and is super maneuverable in VTOL mode), it has twelve missiles, it looks nice, and, most importantly, it's Viking-approved!

This thread has more on the THROMGORD, including a video and the craft file. Let me know if this works for you!
Thanks everyone scriptkitt3h i like you're craft i do want an atmospheric craft but space based is fine.UpsilonAerospace i like you're craft too!

aww C'mon dont compete with the biggest military constructor in the business(KMC) we have an array of planes for you to choose from. my E-4 is the latest of the line equipped with state of the are proprietary missiles.
